Room.Name: The Rhinefield Building
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the Rhinefield Building on the Althemanian College Campus.
Room.LongDescription: This is one of four buildings on the campus which is dedicated to the study of para-psychology. An intense effort is being made to understand exactly how people can learn to control the forces of the mind. Its been known for a long time that there are lower beasts which use mind-control to capture their prey, and although the study of such beasts is dangerous, several researchers have undertaken the project.
